response.original_title: Gacharic Spin - 最高最強伝説-10th Anniversary Special LIVE!!
response.overview: Gacharic Spin, a full-power entertainment girls band, celebrated its 10th anniversary on October 8, 2019. In February, Angelina 1/3, a high school girl, joined the band, and in March, yuri, a former member of LAGOON, joined the band. The new Gacharic Spin, now in its fifth generation, is embarking on a 10th anniversary tour of 40 shows nationwide. The Blu-ray will be released containing the live performance of the tour's finale, the 10th Anniversary SPECIAL LIVE "Saikyou Saikyou Densetsu" at Nakano Sunplaza on October 14, 2019! Includes off-shot movies, a live photobook, and a special box. Contents (from Kinema Junpo database) The ultra-aggressive and flashy girls' band Gacharic Spin's performance at Nakano Sunplaza on October 14 has been released on Blu-ray. This DVD contains footage of the 10th anniversary tour finale of the new Gacharic Spin lineup, with Angelina 1/3, a high school girl, and yuri, a former member of LAGOON, joining the band.
response.title: Gacharic Spin: The Best and Strongest Legend
